system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.53RM572RAaaWLZqq]{Simple Weapon Specialist (Light Club, Medium Club or Heavy Club)}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.uR1tAu3dJH914reS]{Blunt Specialist}

Benefits

When wielding the club chosen from the Simple Weapon Specialist feat, the character gains a +2 attack bonus to all attacks, and takes no penalty when performing non-lethal attacks.
